title: Week 15 Recap, Controversial Calls, Pats Win Game Of Year (Football 12/18)
description:
Will Brinson, Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora gather to recap Week 15 across the NFL. First, Will Nick and Pete discuss the controversial ending to Steelers-Patriots, if the Seahawks are dead, Blake Bortles surprising performance recently, Aaron Rodgers return, and Super Bowl possibilities. Then, JLC joins Will to discuss his dismay with quarterback play across the league especially in Cincy and Miami, and changes that should go into effect the rest of the season in Green Bay and New York. That's followed by an extensive playoff scenario breakdown, with the postseason just two weeks away.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
